phrases.phrase: You do not have the permission to claim the listing
You do not have the permission to edit listing details
You do not have the permission to set a listing to claimable
You do not have the permission to submit a listing
You do not have the permission to view the directory
You do not have the permission to view reviews
This option allows users to set the listing to claimable
Allow contact link on the review page
Allow deep links on the review page
Display the Category List On Directory Index
Display a list of categories on the Left hands side of the directory index page
Allow Google map on the review page if an address is available
Allow location on the review page
Allow logo image on the review page
Allow the main directroy page to display a filter
Allow the Site URL to be displayed on the review page
Allow Telelphone number on the review page
Allow YouTube video on the review page
If a listing is set to claimable, the 1st post will not show the thread owners avatar
Display contact link on Claimable Listings
Select ONE forum to act as your directory forum
Select ONE forum to act as your directory forum
Separate subcategories by commas on the directory main page
Display The Business Directory Sidebar (right) on the Directory Index page
Display Directory Stats On Directory Sidebar
Display the Busniess Directory Statisitics on the directory sidebar (right)
When creating a directory listing, display an image to prompt the user to select a prefix (you will need to create your own image)
Display Recent Business Listings On Directory Sidebar
Display New Listings On Main Forum Sidebar
Display the new Directory Listings on the Main Forum sidebar
Display new Business Listings on the directory sidebar (right)
Display Recent Reviews On Directory Sidebar
Display Recent Reviews on the directory sidebar (right)
Display The Business Directory Sidebar (right) on the Sub-Directory page
Display a prefix filter drop down box
Hide the Directory link from the Nav bar
Include The Current Page In The Sub-Directory Breadcrumb
The number of columns to display in the directory index page
Limit for the number of listings to display on the sidebar (right)
Limit for the number of Business Listing Reviews to display on the sidebar (right)
Order of the categories on the main directoty page, sub directoty pages and left side bar
Display Listing Count in Sub Directory Pages
Display the listing count for each of directories on the sub directory pages
Display the listing count for each of the sub-directories on the Main directory page
Include Child Listing Count in Parent Directory Listing Count
For the Top Level Directory Listing Count also include the child listings, this also applies to counts for subforums
Display Top Level Directory Listing Count
Display the listing count for top level catagories on the Main directory page
Add a relevant YouTube Video, example: www.youtube.com/watch?v=TswOLHUQFPk
add relevant media / a site logo to your listing
Are you sure you want to set this listing to Claimable?
Link to an image on your site, example: www.yoursite.com/logo.jpg
link to important pages of your site
Make sure this file exists on your site and is approximately W:250px Ã— H:200px
Make sure you link to the actual video page (the link should contain: watch?v=....)
Setting this listing to Claimable means other business owners may claim it!
These fields are optional, allowing you to
This field is optional, allowing you to add a site logo

{xen:phrase sfdir_set_listing_to_claimable}

{xen:phrase sfdir_are_you_sure_you_want_to_set_this_listing_to_claimable}

{xen:phrase sfdir_setting_this_listing_to_claimable_means}

Claim This Listing
Do you own this business, or help run it?

If so, you can claim this listing
Once claimed, you can update the listing information and manage the listing details

If possible, please provide some proof of ownership below.
Sending this from a forum account registered with the companies email address is often enough. If you don't have any proof, just add the text "no proof" and someone will get back to you.

This claim will then be sent to a moderation queue for the administrators / moderators to manage.

<xen:title>{xen:phrase add_modify_categories}</xen:title>
<form action="{xen:link 'reviews'}{$threadURL}/ModifyCategories" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay AutoValidator" data-redirect="on" >
<fieldset> <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_cat1">{xen:phrase sfdir_main_category}:</label></dt> <dd>
<select id="ctrl_cat1" class="textCtrl" name="cat1"> <xen:foreach loop="$flat_cat_list" value="$category"> <option value="{$category.node_id}" <xen:if is="{$category.node_id} == {$selected_cats.cat1}"> selected="selected" </xen:if> >{$category.dash_title}</option> </xen:foreach> </select>
</dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_cat2">{xen:phrase sfdir_2nd_category}:</label></dt> <dd>
<select id="ctrl_cat2" class="textCtrl" name="cat2"> <xen:foreach loop="$flat_cat_list" value="$category"> <option value="{$category.node_id}" <xen:if is="{$category.node_id} == {$selected_cats.cat2}"> selected="selected" </xen:if> >{$category.dash_title}</option> </xen:foreach> </select>
</dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_cat3">{xen:phrase sfdir_3rd_category}:</label></dt> <dd>
<select id="ctrl_cat3" class="textCtrl" name="cat3"> <xen:foreach loop="$flat_cat_list" value="$category"> <option value="{$category.node_id}" <xen:if is="{$category.node_id} == {$selected_cats.cat3}"> selected="selected" </xen:if> >{$category.dash_title}</option> </xen:foreach> </select>
</dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_cat4">{xen:phrase sfdir_4th_category}:</label></dt> <dd>
<select id="ctrl_cat4" class="textCtrl" name="cat4"> <xen:foreach loop="$flat_cat_list" value="$category"> <option value="{$category.node_id}" <xen:if is="{$category.node_id} == {$selected_cats.cat4}"> selected="selected" </xen:if> >{$category.dash_title}</option> </xen:foreach> </select>
</dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_cat5">{xen:phrase sfdir_5th_category}:</label></dt> <dd>
<select id="ctrl_cat5" class="textCtrl" name="cat5"> <xen:foreach loop="$flat_cat_list" value="$category"> <option value="{$category.node_id}" <xen:if is="{$category.node_id} == {$selected_cats.cat5}"> selected="selected" </xen:if> >{$category.dash_title}</option> </xen:foreach> </select>
</dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd> <input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase update_listing}" class="button primary" /> </dd> </dl> </fieldset> <input type="hidden" name="oldCat1" value="{$selected_cats.cat1}" /> <input type="hidden" name="oldCat2" value="{$selected_cats.cat2}" /> <input type="hidden" name="oldCat3" value="{$selected_cats.cat3}" /> <input type="hidden" name="oldCat4" value="{$selected_cats.cat4}" /> <input type="hidden" name="oldCat5" value="{$selected_cats.cat5}" />
<input type="hidden" name="threadURL" value="{$threadURL}" /> <input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

{xen:phrase add_modify_logo_url}
If you own a website for your business, you can add a website logo to your listing by linking to the image

The logo should be approximately 250px (width) Ã— 200px (height)

Examples:

www.yoursite/logo.jpg
http://www.yoursite/somefolder/siteimg.png
http://yoursite/someotherfolder/imgname.gif

If you don't own a website, simply upload your logo to the business details

  • {xen:phrase sfdir_this_field_is_optional_allowing_you_to_add_a_site_logo}

{xen:phrase add_modify_youtube_url}
You can provide more information about your business by adding a relevant YouTube movie to your business listing.

Either find a relevant existing YouTube movie, or upload your own movie to YouTube.

Once you've found the movie you wish to add, the YouTube URL can be found under the movie by clicking the "embed" button.

Examples:

www.youtube.com/watch?v=TswOLHUQFPk
youtu.be/TswOLHUQFPk
www.youtube.com/embed/TswOLHUQFPk

  • This field is optional, allowing you to add media

Set Listing to Claimable

Unsetting the claimable status of this listing means other users can no longer claim it!

<xen:title>{xen:phrase update_listing}</xen:title>
<form action="{xen:link 'reviews'}{$threadURL}/DirUpdate" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay AutoValidator" data-redirect="on" >
<fieldset>
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <xen:if is="{$allowTelephone}"> <dt><label for="ctrl_telephone">{xen:phrase telephone}:</label></dt> <dd><input type="text" name="telephone" class="textCtrl" maxlength="100" style="display: block;width: 220px;" value="{$directorylisting.telephone}" /></dd> </xen:if>
<xen:if is="{$allowLocation}"> <dt><label for="ctrl_address_line_1">{xen:phrase address_line_1}:</label></dt> <dd><input type="text" name="address_line_1" class="textCtrl" style="display: block;width: 220px;" maxlength="34" value="{$directorylisting.address_line_1}" /></dd>
<dt><label for="ctrl_address_line_2">{xen:phrase address_line_2}:</label></dt> <dd><input type="text" name="address_line_2" class="textCtrl" maxlength="34" style="display: block;width: 220px;" value="{$directorylisting.address_line_2}" /></dd>
<dt><label for="ctrl_town_city">{xen:phrase town_city}:</label></dt> <dd><input type="text" name="town_city" class="textCtrl" maxlength="34" style="display: block;width: 220px;" value="{$directorylisting.town_city}" /></dd>
<dt><label for="ctrl_postcode">{xen:phrase postcode}:</label></dt> <dd><input type="text" name="postcode" class="textCtrl" maxlength="34" style="display: block;width: 220px;" value="{$directorylisting.postcode}" /></dd> </xen:if> </dl>
</fieldset> <fieldset> <dl class="ctrlUnit">
<dt><label for="ctrl_website_url">{xen:phrase website_url}:</label></dt> <dd> <input type="text" name="website_url" style="float: left;width: 190px;margin-right: 10px;" class="textCtrl" maxlength="120" value="{$directorylisting.website_url}" /> <input type="text" name="website_anchor_text" style="float: left;width: 120px;" class="textCtrl" maxlength="34" value="{$directorylisting.website_anchor_text}" /> </dd>
<xen:if is="{$allowDeepLinks}"> <dt><label for="ctrl_deeplink1_url">{xen:phrase deeplink1_url}:</label></dt> <dd> <input type="text" name="deeplink1_url" style="float: left;width: 190px;margin-right: 10px;" class="textCtrl" maxlength="190" value="{$directorylisting.deeplink1_url}" /> <input type="text" name="deeplink1_anchor_text" style="float: left;width: 120px;" class="textCtrl" maxlength="34" value="{$directorylisting.deeplink1_anchor_text}" /> </dd>
<dt><label for="ctrl_deeplink2_url">{xen:phrase deeplink2_url}:</label></dt> <dd> <input type="text" name="deeplink2_url" style="float: left;width: 190px;margin-right: 10px;" class="textCtrl" maxlength="190" value="{$directorylisting.deeplink2_url}" /> <input type="text" name="deeplink2_anchor_text" style="float: left;width: 120px;" class="textCtrl" maxlength="34" value="{$directorylisting.deeplink2_anchor_text}" /> </dd>
<dt><label for="ctrl_deeplink3_url">{xen:phrase deeplink3_url}:</label></dt> <dd> <input type="text" name="deeplink3_url" style="float: left;width: 190px;margin-right: 10px;" class="textCtrl" maxlength="190" value="{$directorylisting.deeplink3_url}" /> <input type="text" name="deeplink3_anchor_text" style="float: left;width: 120px;" class="textCtrl" maxlength="34" value="{$directorylisting.deeplink3_anchor_text}"/> </dd>
</xen:if>
</dl>
<xen:hook name="thread_create_fields_main" params="{xen:array 'forum={$forum}'}" />
</fieldset>
<xen:if is="{$displayCustomA}"> <fieldset> <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <xen:if is="{$customFieldA1}"> <dt><label for="customFieldA1">{$customFieldA1}:</label></dt> <dd><input type="text" name="customfielda1" class="textCtrl" maxlength="100" style="display: block;width: 220px;" value="{$directorylisting.customfielda1}" /></dd> </xen:if> <xen:if is="{$customFieldA2}"> <dt><label for="customFieldA2">{$customFieldA2}:</label></dt> <dd><input type="text" name="customfielda2" class="textCtrl" maxlength="100" style="display: block;width: 220px;" value="{$directorylisting.customfielda2}" /></dd> </xen:if> <xen:if is="{$customFieldA3}"> <dt><label for="customFieldA3">{$customFieldA3}:</label></dt> <dd><input type="text" name="customfielda3" class="textCtrl" maxlength="100" style="display: block;width: 220px;" value="{$directorylisting.customfielda3}" /></dd> </xen:if> <xen:if is="{$customFieldA4}"> <dt><label for="customFieldA4">{$customFieldA4}:</label></dt> <dd><input type="text" name="customfielda4" class="textCtrl" maxlength="100" style="display: block;width: 220px;" value="{$directorylisting.customfielda4}" /></dd> </xen:if>
</dl> </fieldset> </xen:if>
<xen:if is="{$displayCustomB}"> <fieldset> <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <xen:if is="{$customFieldB1}"> <dt><label for="customFieldB1">{$customFieldB1}:</label></dt> <dd><input type="text" name="customfieldb1" class="textCtrl" maxlength="100" style="display: block;width: 220px;" value="{$directorylisting.customfieldb1}" /></dd> </xen:if> <xen:if is="{$customFieldB2}"> <dt><label for="customFieldB2">{$customFieldB2}:</label></dt> <dd><input type="text" name="customfieldb2" class="textCtrl" maxlength="100" style="display: block;width: 220px;" value="{$directorylisting.customfieldb2}" /></dd> </xen:if> <xen:if is="{$customFieldB3}"> <dt><label for="customFieldB3">{$customFieldB3}:</label></dt> <dd><input type="text" name="customfieldb3" class="textCtrl" maxlength="100" style="display: block;width: 220px;" value="{$directorylisting.customfieldb3}" /></dd> </xen:if> <xen:if is="{$customFieldB4}"> <dt><label for="customFieldB4">{$customFieldB4}:</label></dt> <dd><input type="text" name="customfieldb4" class="textCtrl" maxlength="100" style="display: block;width: 220px;" value="{$directorylisting.customfieldb4}" /></dd> </xen:if> </dl> </fieldset> </xen:if>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd> <input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase update_listing}" class="button primary" /> </dd> </dl> <input type="hidden" name="threadURL" value="{$threadURL}" />
<input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

{xen:phrase edit_post_by_x, 'name={$post.username}'} {xen:helper threadPrefix, $thread}{$thread.title} {xen:helper nodeClasses, $nodeBreadCrumbs, $forum}
{xen:raw $editorTemplate}
{xen:phrase options}:

<xen:title>{xen:phrase delete_thread}: {xen:helper threadPrefix, $thread, escaped}{$thread.title}</xen:title> <xen:h1>{xen:phrase delete_thread}: {xen:helper threadPrefix, $thread}{$thread.title}</xen:h1>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb source="$nodeBreadCrumbs" /> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:threads, $thread}">{xen:helper threadPrefix, $thread}{$thread.title}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<xen:container var="$bodyClasses">{xen:helper nodeClasses, $nodeBreadCrumbs, $forum}</xen:container> <xen:container var="$searchBar.thread"><xen:include template="search_bar_thread_only" /></xen:container> <xen:container var="$searchBar.forum"><xen:include template="search_bar_forum_only" /></xen:container>
<form action="{xen:link 'reviews/'}{$thread.url}/delete" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay">
<xen:include template="helper_deletion_type_unit" />
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd><input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase delete_thread}" class="button primary" /></dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> <input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>
